author: danny
msg: Patched as submitted by Iwasa Kazmi [kzmi@ca2.so-net.ne.jp] to handle null postmaster and sender

author: serge
msg: Added better documentation in the service method as it's rather complicated what the heck is going on.

author: serge
msg: Set a cap of 1000 messages when retrieving (to memory) the list of messages to process.  This will avoid loading way too much into memory when there are tens or hundreds of thousands of messages.

author: serge
msg: Added getConnection() back in as MimeMessageJDBCSource is dependent on it.

author: serge
msg: Need to save lastupdated time on mail so that the same message doesn't get retried numerous times.
